FUNCTION contains(b, target) RESULT(found)
  integer(8), dimension(:), intent(in) :: b
  integer(8), intent(in) :: target
  logical :: found
  integer :: low, high, mid

  low = 1
  high = size(b)
  found = .false. do while (low <= high)
    mid = (low + high)/2
    if (b(mid) == target) then
      found = .true.
      exit
    elseif (target < b(mid)) then
      high = mid -1
    else
      low = mid +1
    endif
  end do
END FUNCTION contains

module binary_utils

LOGICAL FUNCTION contains(B, target)
  integer(8), dimension(:), intent(in) :: B
  integer(8), intent(in) :: target
  integer :: low, high, mid

  low = 1
  high = size(B)
  contains = .false. do while (low <= high)
    mid = (low + high)/2
    if (B(mid) == target) then
        contains = .true.

FUNCTION contains(b, target) RESULT(found)
  integer(8), dimension(:), intent(in) :: b
  integer(8), intent(in) :: target
  logical :: found
  integer :: low, high, mid

  low = 1
  high = size(b)
  found = .false.
  do while (low <= high)
    mid = (low + high)/2
    if (b(mid) == target) then
      found = .true.
      exit
    elseif (target < b(mid)) then
      high = mid -1
    else
      low = mid +1
    endif
  end do
END FUNCTION contains

module binary_utils

LOGICAL FUNCTION contains(B, target)
  integer(8), dimension(:), intent(in) :: B

    if (B(mid) == target) then
        contains = .true.
        return
    else if (target < B(mid)) then
        high = mid - 1
    else
        low = mid +1

module quicksort_mod
implicit none

contains

recursive subroutine quicksort(a, low, high)
  integer(8), dimension(:), intent(inout) :: a
  integer, intent(in) :: low, high
  integer(8) :: pivot, temp
  integer :: i, j
  if (low < high) then
    pivot = a(high)
    i = low
    do j = low, high
      if (a(j) <= pivot) then
        temp = a(i)
        a(i) = a(j)
        a(j) = temp
        i = i + 1
      end if
    end do
    call quicksort(a, low, i-2)
    call quicksort(a, i, high)
  end if
end subroutine quicksort

end module quicksort_mod

module quicksort
contains
    recursive subroutine sort(array)
        integer(8), dimension(:), intent(in out) :: array
        call quicksort(array,1,size(array))
    end subroutine sort
    recursive subroutine quicksort(arr, first, last)
        integer(8), dimension(:), intent(inout) :: arr
        integer, intent(in) :: first, last
        integer :: pivotindex
        integer(8) :: temp
        if (first < last) then
            call partition(arr, first, last, pivotindex)
            call quicksort(arr, first, pivotindex-1)
            call quicksort(arr, pivotindex+1, last)
        end if
    end subroutine quicksort
    subroutine partition(arr, first, last, pivotindex)
        integer(8), dimension(:), intent(inout) :: arr
        integer, intent(in) :: first, last
        integer, intent(out) :: pivotindex
        integer :: i, pivot
        integer(8) :: temp
        pivot = arr(last)
        pivotindex = first
        do i = first, last-1
            if (arr(i) <= pivot) then
                temp = arr(i)
                arr(i) = arr(pivotindex)
                arr(pivotindex) = temp
                pivotindex = pivotindex +1
            end if
        end do
        temp = arr(pivotindex)
        arr(pivotindex) = arr(last)
        arr(last) = temp
    end subroutine partition
end module quicksort

module m_sort
implicit none
contains

recursive subroutine quicksort(a, left, right)
    ! Sorts the array a(left:right) in place
    integer(8), dimension(:), intent(inout) :: a
    integer, intent(in) :: left, right
    integer :: i, j
    integer(8) :: temp, pivot

    if ( right > left )
    then
        pivot = a( (left + right)/2 )
        i = left
        j = right
        do
            ! find index i such that a(i) >= pivot
            do while (a(i) < pivot)
                i = i + 1
            end do
            ! find index j such that a(j) <= pivot
            do while (a(j) > pivot)
                j = j -1
            end do
            if (i <= j) then
                ! Swap a(i) and a(j)
                temp = a(i)
                a(i) = a(j)
                a(j) = temp
                i = i +1
                j = j -1
            end if
        end do
        call quicksort(a, left, j)
        call quicksort(a, i, right)
    end if

end subroutine quicksort

end module m_sort

module quicksort_mod
 contains
 recursive subroutine quicksort(a, left, right)
    ! Sorts the array a(left:right)
    integer(8), dimension(:), intent(inout) :: a
    integer, intent(in) :: left, right
    integer :: i, j
    integer(8) :: temp, pivot

    if (right > left) then
        pivot = a( (left+right)/2 )
        i = left
        j = right
        do
            do while (a(i) < pivot)
                i = i +1
            end do
            do while (a(j) > pivot)
                j = j -1
            end do
            if (i <= j) then
                temp = a(i)
                a(i) = a(j)
                a(j) = temp
                i = i +1
                j = j -1
            end if
            if (i > j) exit
        end do
        call quicksort(a, left, j)
        call quicksort(a, i, right)
    end if
 end subroutine quicksort
end module quicksort_mod

module binary_utils
contains
 LOGICAL FUNCTION contains(B, target)
   integer(8), dimension(:), intent(in) :: B
   integer(8), intent(in) :: target
   integer :: low, high, mid
   low = 1
   high = size(B)
   contains = .false.
   do while (low <= high)
      mid = (low + high) / 2
      if (B(mid) == target) then
         contains = .true.
         return
      else if (target < B(mid)) then
         high = mid -1
      else
         low = mid +1
      end if
   end do
 end FUNCTION contains
end module binary_utils
